thread.title: Facebook offers 360-degree video viewer
thread.title_full: Facebook offers 360-degree video viewer - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Wendy Lee
title: Facebook offers 360-degree video viewer
text:
Photo: Facebook Facebook users can rotate their viewpoint as they watch 360-degree videos. Facebook users can rotate their viewpoint as they watch 360-degree...
Facebook released a tool Wednesday that will allow users to get the most out of videos that are recorded in 360 degrees. Facebook users can rotate their viewpoint as they watch 360-degree videos. Facebook users can rotate their viewpoint as they watch 360-degree...
Facebook released a tool Wednesday that will allow users to get the most out of videos that are recorded in 360 degrees.
